7100.name: The Edge Of The Water
7100.description:
The pool side is dimly lit up by your light. Visible is absolutely
nothing else nearby. The darkness her seems enormously oppressive here.
The air is damp and the rock on which you stand is slippery. The pool
seems too dark to make anything clear. The pool seems to extend to the
east. The rock can be climbed upwards from here. The wind howls around
exposed peaks. Snow clings to shadowed crevices.

up.description: A steep trail ascends to The Fissure Under The Ledge

7101.name: Under The Mudhole
7101.description:
The area opens in a small room with a great big opening in the ceiling.
From this opening there is mud dripping down in large lumps. >YUCK<. You
can smell the foul stench of the slimy sediment as you try not to get
covered by the falling sludge. To the east there is an entryway leading
out from here and it seems absolutely impossible to force the muddy
descent. Bare rock dominates the landscape. The path is steep and
treacherous.

east.description: East.  You see nothing of interest.

7102.name: Under The Dark Pit
7102.description:
Nice place you found yourself in. The area opens in the middle of a room
with only two exits, up and east. A tall ladder has been left here so
that you can climb up through the pit without the use of a rope. The
smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. The cobblestones are worn
smooth by countless feet.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to A Junction In The Sewer Pipes

up.description: Up.  You can't see a thing up there, it is way too dark.

down.description: The cobblestones lead to Cave Entrance

7103.name: A Muddy Bend In The Sewer System
7103.description:
This is what looks like a bend in the pipe system of the sewer. The
'floor' is covered completely by mud! This includes covering your legs
up to your knees as well. The pipe leads west and south. Rocks jut from
the grassy slopes. Sheep trails wind between the hillocks.

south.description: To the south there is less mud than here!  It actually seems to end there! You have a felling it would be nice to have your feet free from mud again.

west.description: You can see a room in which mud drips from the roof onto the floor in  great cakes of sludge.  There doesn't seem to be any exits from that room apart from in you direction.

7104.name: A Junction In The Sewer Pipes
7104.description:
The area opens in the middle of what looks like a triple junction of
pipes going east, west and north. Buildings crowd together on all sides.
Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: You can see a mud area starting in that direction.

east.description: East.  You can't even make out what it might look like, it is just too dark.

west.description: West.  There is a room with a ladder leading up.

7105.name: Down The Old Well
7105.description:
The area is dangling on the slippery sides of the old well leading down
and up. The only secure point here is the metal bars that are cemented
into the sides, the ones that you cling frantically to so that you don't
fall. Who knows how deep this well is? The bars lead down and up and
nowhere else. The path is steep and treacherous. The wind howls around
exposed peaks.

up.description: There is a slight, dim light from above, or maybe it is just your imagination. Anyway it SEEMS darker down here than up there, if that is possible.

7106.name: The Northwestern Corner Of The Ledge
7106.description:
The area opens, swaying out from the ledge, with only a couple of inches
of safe, solid ledge under your feet. The ledge continues to the east
but not back south. It seems that the ledge is too narrow to turn on so
you'll have to continue forward. Snow clings to shadowed crevices. Bare
rock dominates the landscape.

down.description: The Abyss lies down there.  Who knows what might lurk down there?

7107.name: The Narrow Ledge
7107.description:
This is the process of walking all the way around the ledge since there
is no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS
another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high
probability of a free fall session afterwards. Bare rock dominates the
landscape. The air is thin and cold at this altitude.

north.description: North.  The ledge leads into a corner and turns eastward.

east.description: You stare into mid-air, and right under there is absolutely nothing but  darkness.  You shiver by the thought of falling an utterly unknown distance.

south.description: South.  The ledge leads further south into utter darkness.

7108.name: The Narrow Ledge
7108.description:
This is the process of walking all the way around the ledge since there
is no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS
another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high
probability of a free fall session afterwards. Bare rock dominates the
landscape. Snow clings to shadowed crevices.

north.description: North.  The ledge leads further north.

east.description: You stare into mid-air, and right under there is absolutely nothing but darkness.  You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.

south.description: The ledge continues further south into darkness.

7109.name: The Narrow Ledge
7109.description:
This is the process of walking all the way around the ledge since there
is no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS
another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high
probability of a free fall session afterwards. The path is steep and
treacherous. Bare rock dominates the landscape.

north.description: North.  The ledge leads further north.

east.description: You stare into mid-air, and right under there is absolutely nothing but darkness.  You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.

south.description: The ledge continues south into darkness.

7110.name: The Narrow Ledge
7110.description:
This is the process of walking all the way around the ledge since there
is no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS
another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high
probability of a free fall session afterwards. The path is steep and
treacherous. Bare rock dominates the landscape.

north.description: North.  The ledge leads further north.

east.description: You stare into mid-air, and right under there is absolutely nothing but darkness.  You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.

south.description: South.  You can just make out the south-western corner of this ledge.

7111.name: The Southwestern Corner Of The Ledge
7111.description:
This seems like a ledge that is a little broader than the one just to
the north of here. The ledge seems to lead around some sort of Abyss of
total darkness. The ledge seems to have an odd-looking edge here. The
path is steep and treacherous. Bare rock dominates the landscape.

north.description: North.  The ledge leads further north.

east.description: You see a broad ledge leading eastward.

south.description: South of here is the exit from the ledge.

down.description: The Abyss lies down there.  Who knows what might lurk down there?

7112.name: An Odd Intersection
7112.description:
The area opens in a rather odd intersection of pipes. The pipes actually
don't resemble pipes anymore. They look more like a real stone tunnel,
or a passageway hewn directly into the rock. The ways from here lead
north, east and west. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless
feet. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: North.  You see a ledge to something that looks like an abyss.

east.description: A passage leads to Under The Pit

west.description: The cobblestones lead to A Junction In The Sewer Pipes

7113.name: The Narrow Ledge Going East To West
7113.description:
This is the process of walking all the way around the ledge since there
is no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS
another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high
probability of a free fall session afterwards. Snow clings to shadowed
crevices. The wind howls around exposed peaks.

south.description: You stare into mid-air, and right under there is absolutely nothing but darkness.  You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.

7114.name: Mid-Air
7114.description:
You've just stepped into the most unlucky position in the whole of
CircleMUD. The result of such a foolish act should be punished with
death, you know. With an acceleration of approximately 9.82 meters per
second squared, you are now descending the Abyss. What awaits you at the
bottom will continue to be a mystery. Good-bye cruel world. The ceiling
hangs low overhead. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

north.description: A steep trail ascends to The Narrow Eastern Ledge

east.description: A steep trail ascends to The Narrow Eastern Ledge

south.description: A steep trail ascends to The Narrow Eastern Ledge

west.description: A steep trail ascends to The Narrow Eastern Ledge

up.description: A rocky path climbs toward The Broad Ledge

7115.name: The Broad Ledge
7115.description:
This area is a ledge that seems quite a lot larger than the rest of the
ledges. This one leads to the west and the east, plus it has an exit
going to the south. Though you could jump into mid-air, but it probably
wouldn't be such a good idea. The way south is in utter darkness. The
terrain rolls and dips around. Rocks jut from the grassy slopes.

east.description: The Southeastern Corner Of The Ledge

south.description: A trail winds toward The Sewer Line

west.description: The Southwestern Corner Of The Ledge

7116.name: The Northeastern Corner Of The Ledge
7116.description:
The area opens, swaying out from the ledge, with only a couple of inches
of safe, solid ledge under your feet. The ledge continues to the west
and leads south from here into darkness. The wind howls around exposed
peaks. Snow clings to shadowed crevices.

south.description: A steep trail ascends to The Narrow Eastern Ledge

down.description: You can just make out the outline of a trapdoor here in the soil.  The earth is probably there to conceal a secret entrance.  This looks as if it leads down into the seemingly solid rock face of the ledge.

7117.name: The Narrow Eastern Ledge
7117.description:
This is the process of walking all the way around the ledge since there
is no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS
another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high
probability of a free fall session afterwards. And THAT is west of here
so watch your step. Snow clings to shadowed crevices. The path is steep
and treacherous.

west.description: You stare into mid-air, and right under there is absolutely nothing but darkness.  You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.

7118.name: The Narrow Eastern Ledge
7118.description:
This is the process of walking all the way around the ledge since there
is no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS
another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high
probability of a free fall session afterwards. And THAT is west of here
so watch your step. The wind howls around exposed peaks. The air is thin
and cold at this altitude.

west.description: You stare into mid-air, and right under there is absolutely nothing but darkness.  You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.

7119.name: The Narrow Eastern Ledge
7119.description:
This is the process of walking all the way around the ledge since there
is no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS
another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high
probability of a free fall session afterwards. And THAT is west of here
so watch your step. Snow clings to shadowed crevices. The wind howls
around exposed peaks.

west.description: You stare into mid-air, and right under there is absolutely nothing but darkness.  You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.

7120.name: The Narrow Eastern Ledge
7120.description:
This is the process of walking all the way around the ledge since there
is no way of turning around on this all too narrow path. There IS
another exit from here but that leads right into mid-air and with high
probability of a free fall session afterwards. And THAT is west of here
so watch your step. You also see a small opening to the east. Snow
clings to shadowed crevices. The wind howls around exposed peaks.

west.description: You stare into mid-air, and right under there is absolutely nothing but darkness.  You shiver by the thought of falling that distance.

7121.name: The Southeastern Corner Of The Ledge
7121.description:
This seems like a ledge that is a little broader than the one just to
the north of here. The ledge seems to lead around some sort of abyss of
total darkness. The air is thin and cold at this altitude. The wind
howls around exposed peaks.

north.description: North of here you can see a ledge.

down.description: The Abyss lies down there.  Who knows what might lurk down there?

7122.name: Under The Pit
7122.description:
The area opens in a completely dark cavern leading west. The wall looks
weird here. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Dust motes drift in the
stale air. The air is stale and the walls close. Shadows pool in the
corners, undisturbed.

west.description: The cobblestones lead to An Odd Intersection

7123.name: Under The Shaft
7123.description:
A ladder leads up from here to the Shaft. A small opening leads west
from here. Snow clings to shadowed crevices. The wind howls around
exposed peaks.

west.description: You can see a narrow ledge going north and south.

up.description: It is too dark up there.

7129.name: The Sewer Line
7129.description:
This is a narrow part of the sewer. Down the sewer continues and to the
north is the ledge. Branches intertwine overhead, filtering the light.
Ancient trees rise on all sides.

north.description: You can see the southern part of the ledge.

down.description: You look deeper down into the drain.

7190.name: Mid-Air
7190.description:
You've just stepped into the most unlucky position in the whole of
CircleMUD. The result of such a foolish act should be punished with
death, you know. With an acceleration of approximately 9.82 meters per
second squared, you are now descending the Abyss. What awaits you at the
bottom will continue to be a mystery. Good-bye cruel world. Shadows
gather in the corners. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

north.description: A steep trail ascends to The Narrow Ledge

east.description: A steep trail ascends to The Narrow Ledge

south.description: A steep trail ascends to The Narrow Ledge

west.description: A steep trail ascends to The Narrow Ledge

up.description: The Narrow Ledge Going East To West

7101.name: rat
7101.long_desc: A diseased rat with matted fur gnaws on something unidentifiable.

7102.name: crocodile
7102.long_desc: A crocodile lurks in the murky water, only its eyes visible.

7103.name: otyugh
7103.long_desc: A disgusting otyugh wallows in the filth, its tentacles waving.

7104.name: thief
7104.long_desc: A ragged thief hides in the shadows, clutching a rusty knife.

7105.name: ooze
7105.long_desc: A gray ooze slides along the walls, dissolving anything it touches.

7106.name: beggar
7106.long_desc: A wretched beggar has made their home in this filthy place.

7190.name: ring
7190.room_desc: A lovely silver ring has been left here.
